response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to offer you this exceptional item at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000, providing you with an excellent return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
